name: Filippo Valle
body:
# Welcome to Filippo Valle's page.

This is my window on the net!

##Contacts
You may contact me at [filippovalle(at)aim.com](mailto:filippovalle@aim.com)!

Search [my profile](https://keybase.io/filippov) **Keybase** there are some interesting things about me and the security of this page.

#Curriculum Vitae
[Click here](https://github.com/fvalle1/fvalle1.github.io/blob/master/CV-Filippo_Valle-EN.pdf) if you wish to **find my CV**

##Reference
Wish to **know more**?
Read this [interview](http://www.carnevaledellafisica.it/2014/11/dal-liceo-alla-facolta-di-fisica.html)!

##Projects
I made a project called *Analisi di raggi cosmici con Supercomputer* during High school.

Have a look [this is what I realised](https://github.com/fvalle1/fvalle1.github.io/blob/master/Tesina.pdf) and there are also [some slides](https://github.com/fvalle1/fvalle1.github.io/blob/master/Tesina-beam.pdf).

This work is referenced [here](http://www.istitutomoro.it/area-studenti-e-famiglie/esame-di-stato/esempi-di-tesine/analisi-di-raggi-cosmici-mediante-supercomputer/), and it is also on [Amazon](http://www.amazon.it/Analisi-raggi-cosmici-mediante-supercomputer-ebook/dp/B00N7J1690/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1456556459&sr=8-1&keywords=analisi+di+raggi+cosmici+mediante+supercomputer)!
